preqs: Students must have passed one of the following before undertaking this unit:  ECB1101, ECF1100, ECG1101, ECS1101, ECW1101, ECC1000.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB1101, ECC1000, ECF1100, ECG1101, ECP1100, ECS1101, ECW1101} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECC2550%, ECC3550%, ECF3550%, ECW3550, ECX2550, ECX3550}
Unit was previously coded {ECC2550, ECF2550, ECH2550, ECO2550, ECX2550}

description: The recent economic and social development of selected Asian countries, especially the role of the business sector. Topics include entrepreneurship; technological change; the dynamics of comparative advantage; import substitution versus export-oriented industrial growth; the development state; the stages of business growth.
